title: Himalaya Natural Glow Kesar Face : // Review Product
description:
Himalaya Malaysia Products Available At AMMA.my

Himalaya‚Äôs Natural Glow Fairness Cream is an advanced skin lightening formula. Its unique formulation ensures five visible actions: lightens, Reduces dark spots, enhances glow, removes dullness, moisturizes, and softens skin. It nourishes and moisturizes the skin without a greasy feel. The unique Phyto‚ÄìVitamin Complex in Natural Glow Fairness Cream comes from a complex of Alfalfa and Saffron.

Part of my Himalaya Herbals haul, I also got the Natural Glow Fairness Cream which I will review today and tell you if it actually works or not. I am not huge on fairness creams. I don‚Äôt crave for fairness and also, I do not go on and use every single product I happen to come across. I have oily, acne prone skin with my complexion on the dusky side. An advanced skin lightening formula enriched with a Phyto Vitamin Complex, containing a combination of Alfalfa, Saffron and other essential vitamins. Alfalfa inhibits melanin synthesis; Saffron helps lighten skin tone and brightens a dull complexion. In combination these ingredients provide your skin with an even tone, nourishment and glow, naturally.

5 visible results:
‚Ä¢ Lightens and evens skin tone
‚Ä¢ Helps reduce blemishes and dark spots
‚Ä¢ Helps reduce under-eye dark circles
‚Ä¢ Nourishes skin to keep it healthy
‚Ä¢ Moisturizes without leaving skin greasy

Does not contain bleach.
Free from parabens.

Himalaya Fairness Cream comes in a soft pink colored tube with a dark green colored screw cap. I like the packaging and so does my mom. The tube has an appealing look. The fairness cream is light, pale pink in color. It has a fine, smooth texture and consistency. It spreads easily and does not make the face oily or greasy. It gets absorbed pretty nicely.The Natural Glow slightly smells of saffron but otherwise, it has the classic ‚Äòfairness cream wala‚Äô smell. However, I find the smell good.
The fairness cream does not dry out the skin, does not leave a white cast on face and does not make the face feel stretchy. Himalaya Natural Glow Cream provides a healthy glow to the face, though artificial and temporary. The skin remains fairly moisturised while using this product. However, this Fairness Cream does not even out the skin tone and about the skin nourishment part, I am very uncertain.
Himalaya Herbals Natural Glow Fairness Cream is a good fairness cream. Not for having fair skin but useful in lightening minor spots and dark circles. I am unsure of this cream‚Äôs ability to lighten skin tone but for wheatish to fair skinned girls, this product can be useful. However, I do not recommend it for oily/acne prone skinned people.
